journal-title-group.journal-title: Journal of Feminist Studies in Religion

title-group.article-title: Roundtable Discussion: What Are the Sources of My Theology?

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1985 The Journal of Feminist Studies in Religion, Inc.
